{"id":983776810,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1688219790,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/983776810/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"7.6 MB","code":"#include <cctype> // For isalnum() and tolower() functions\n#include <string>\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    // Function to check if a string is a palindrome\n    bool isPalindrome(string s) {\n        string cleanStr = \"\"; // String to store the cleaned and normalized version of the input\n\n        // Remove non-alphanumeric characters and convert to lowercase\n        for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {\n            if (isalnum(s[i])) {\n                cleanStr.push_back(tolower(s[i]));\n            }\n        }\n\n        // Check if the cleaned string is a palindrome\n        for (int i = 0; i < cleanStr.size() / 2; i++) {\n            if (cleanStr[i] != cleanStr[cleanStr.size() - i - 1]) {\n                return false;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return true;\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
